pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data for the Vignette and Examples in 'RFlocalfdr' // Data for the vignette and examples in 'RFlocalfdr'. Contains a dataset of 1103547 importance values, and the table of variables used in the random forest splits. The data is Chromosome 22 taken from Auton et al. (2015) doi:10.1038/nature15393. It also contains a 51 samples by 22283 genes data set taken from Spira et al. (2004) doi:10.1165/rcmb.2004-0273OC.
